nodes.bodyText: maybe consider the general (no existing installation in place) page fot it: https://github.com/eclipse/sw360/wiki/Deploy-Natively
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,126 @@
+
+## SW360 Multi-Language System
+
+### Introduction
+
+SW360 multi-language can support multiple languages. In this way, SW360 can internationalize. With each localization, user can select the appropriate language and contribute more local translations.
+
+### Language Extension 
+
+By the default SW360 language is English, language extensions are added and based on English.
+
+With each language, it will have a special language extension that is language for local.
+
+Language extension contains a pair: key and value
+* Key: used to get value of key and replace text to key in source code.
+* Value: the local language translation.
+
+### How to deploy
+
+Refer to the document:
+
+https://github.com/eclipse/sw360/wiki/Deploy-Upgrade-to-Liferay-7.2

nodes.bodyText:
this made me suspicous and it looks like moderations do not work. Accepting a moderation request returns an empty moderation portlet and the following exeption:
2020-04-05 23:16:08.149 ERROR [http-nio-8080-exec-122][ModerationPortlet:187] Error in Moderation 
org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransportException: HTTP Response code: 500

It seems like the moderation requests for components is broken, not projects. Projects moderation reqeusts seem to work but not component. BTW. screenshot is:

(after accepting a moderation request, screen should return to moderation request list)
moderation request for releases seem to work as well ..

ok, I checked this issue and fixed.
Because I base on version 6 so when merge with version 8, maybe will appear problem.
Please help me re-check.
that looks oddly formatted, but not really a big issue.

https://datatables.net/examples/advanced_init/language_file.html
